column5: Hey all! The Ontario Fishing Regs state in Durham region all streams from the CN bridge to the lake are no closed season. It does not say anything about the Wilmot being closed after the 31st of Dec. I thought it was closed. Can anyone shed a light on this.  Fred

South of the tracks is open all season. There is a extended season between hwy 2 and the cnr that closes at the end of the year in that zone. I spent most of last years winter on the wilmot, since it was so mild it didn't really freeze up
If the train tracks are to the North and the big lake is to the South, fish.
